sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SANDEFJORD, the oldest and most famous spa in Norway, in Jarlsberg-Laurvik amt (county), 86 m. S.S.W. of Christiania by the Skien railway. Pop. (1900) 4847. The springs are sulphurous, saline and chalybeate. Specimens of jaettegryder or giantâ€™s cauldrons may be seen at Gaardaasen and Vindalsbugt, some upwards of 23 ft. in depth.
